name: Witty Web Solutions
tagline: Miami based web and mobile development company
description:
WWS develops data driven web applications for education, e-commerce, fashion & beauty, healthcare, real estate, legal and marketing companies. Keywords are databases, e-commerce, CMS, social media, web development, mobile apps.
We provide web and mobile development and support on full stack solutions with back-end, web and mobile based front ends. Most of our solutions for schools are Word Press based solutions.
We also fix / improve existing solutions when your current or former development team is unavailable.
Our solutions are creative, reliable, on time and in budget and our support is better than the industry's standards. Our average programmer has 8 years+ industry experience.
We have staff to deliver in the following technologies: - WordPress - MS SQL, MySQL - ASP.NET, C#, PHP, Java, C/C++ - Javascript, JQuery, HTML/HTML5, CSS, Angular.js - Android, iPhone - Node.js, Python - Ruby On Rails
